item.description:

all the codes i found about em

case 11777: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(3994); c.doubleHit = true; c.usingClaws = true; c.specAccuracy = 2.40; c.specDamage = 1.40; c.specEffect = 5; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

int dclawhit = Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit());
			int dclawhit2 = dclawhit / 2;
			int dclawhit3 = dclawhit2 / 2;							
					applyPlayerClawDamage(i, 1, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit()));
					if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) {
						applyPlayerClawDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc.random(4)));
						applyPlayerClawDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc.random(8)));

					}	

if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) {
					
						applyPlayerClawDamage(i, 2, c.previousDamage / 2 + Misc.random(4));
						applyPlayerClawDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit() + Misc.random(8)));
						

					}
			}

[code]if(clawDelay > 0) {
clawDelayâ€“;
}
if(clawDelay == 1) {
double damage4 = 0;

		if(playerIndex > 0) {
			getCombat().applyPlayerClawDamage(playerIndex, 1, previousDamage / 2);
		}
		damage4 = previousDamage % 2;
		if(damage4 >= 0.001) {
			previousDamage = previousDamage + 1;
			damage4 = 0;
		}

		if(playerIndex > 0) {
			getCombat().applyPlayerClawDamage(playerIndex, 2, previousDamage);
		}
		clawDelay = 0;
		specEffect = 0;
		previousDamage = 0;
		usingClaws = false;
